game.name: Cyber Manhunt
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards
game.shortDescription: Cyber Manhunt is a story-oriented puzzle game focusing on big data, hacking, citizen privacy, and social workers. It focuses on social issues such as cyber violence and privacy breaches.

跟奥威尔很像，但是完成度很低。不太喜欢这个乱七八糟的设定，一个中国游戏，设定在一个名字像南美的国家、使用的是欧元、主体民族是白人、名字又中东又印度、展现出来的work ethic明显就是中国职场那种虐待关系。给人一种很想往国际化上靠，又找不到入口的感觉。不伦不类的。
